wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Frederick Eyre (born 3 February 1944) is an English former professional football player and coach. After retiring from the sport, Eyre became a successful businessman, author, after-dinner speaker and radio pundit. He is the father of former Rochdale manager Steve Eyre.

response: In 2010, he released his autobiography, entitled ... I Only Wanted to Play Football. The foreword is written by Fred Eyre, his manager at Stalybridge Celtic. He decided to write the book under persuasion by wife Lorna, who also edited it.
